thread.title: Ground News - Civil Rights Attorney Ben Crump Receives Honorary Doctorate from Lewis & Clark College
thread.title_full: Ground News - Civil Rights Attorney Ben Crump Receives Honorary Doctorate from Lewis & Clark College

author: The Skanner News
title: Ground News - Civil Rights Attorney Ben Crump Receives Honorary Doctorate from Lewis & Clark College
text:
Summary by The Skanner News Ben Crump appeared at Lewis and Clark College last week to deliver the Martin Luther King Jr. Endowed Lecture, and to receive an honorary doctor of humane letters degree in recognition for his work in civil rights. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
The Skanner News Civil Rights Attorney Ben Crump Receives Honorary Doctorate from Lewis & Clark College Ben Crump appeared at Lewis and Clark College last week to deliver the Martin Luther King Jr. Endowed Lecture, and to receive an honorary doctor of humane letters degree in recognition for his work in civil rights.
